title: will all Ryze skins come for sale ? quick question
body: will all Ryze skins come for sale or in to bundle like all the Shen/Poppy skins ?

replies.body: We don't have information on future sales or bundles.  Any updates on this will be provided on the [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)site.

[Ryze skins are actually on sale right at this moment, until July 20th.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/ryze-rune-mage-available-now)

It was announced with the Champion Update article and not in a separate sales article.
Indeed, nice one Rineyy!  The Big Blue Ryze Bundle appears to be up on Champion Update section.  The bundle doesn't appear to be enabled on the store yet, but should be up asap.
Why isn't young ryze there? :/ On the stream they said that they really wanted it up for sale as they said there was a lot of work done on it.

The bundle is available in the store now, and I was able to confirm that all the skins mentioned in the [bundle sale ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/ryze-rune-mage-available-now)are there.
